name: Don't Touch It! (KirKami)
description:
Doomsday Clock shows how soon is inevitable end of Humankind due to nuclear holocaust.

But what if we joke about it? How about smacking those who wants to try it?

In this game you play role of political summit gatherer on which every member of it is very eager to smack that big red button pushing everything to end. That’s why you need to instead smack their hands while they are trying this.

But they are not as straight forward as you think. They’ll be trying to talk you over, do it stealthly, distracting you, shouting on each other, and even straight up steal this button to press it hidden.

Have fun delaying inevitable end of Humankind.
